column1: Did you know that honey never spoils? Archaeologists have found edible honey in ancient Egyptian tombs!
The shortest war in history lasted only 38-45 minutes between Britain and Zanzibar in 1896.
A group of flamingos is called a 'flamboyance' - isn't that perfect?
Octopuses have three hearts and blue blood. Two hearts pump blood to the gills!
The Great Wall of China isn't visible from space with the naked eye - that's just a myth!
Bananas are berries, but strawberries aren't. Science can be confusing sometimes!
There are more trees on Earth than stars in the Milky Way galaxy. Nature is amazing!
A shrimp's heart is in its head. Talk about thinking with your heart!
The word 'set' has the most different meanings in the English language - over 430!
Wombat poop is cube-shaped. Yes, you read that right - nature is weird!
